message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to avoid further losses from inflation.
Let's compromise, 55/45 is more reasonable considering the inflation impact on me is higher.
Bob, time is running out and we're both losing. I'll take a slight hit from my previous offer, let's settle for 58/42 before inflation eats away more of our potential gains.
Given the increasing impact of inflation, I'm willing to adjust slightly from my last offer to 57/43, but I believe this is as fair as it gets considering our mutual losses.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out.  I'm coming down to 56/44. Take it or leave it, but another round will hurt us both.
